name: Legend of Time
description:
So far, it's an interactive fiction prototype for the game. This is actually the second iteration of the game, without transformations and with a better start. The game is fully playable up to the start of the first dungeon.

Edit 7/4/21: Now this includes the RPGmaker prototype for the game, which contains roughly the same amount of gameplay as the IF but with visuals, and rough controller support. (For Windows only for now)
